review: Reading all these comments about it's hard to set up  makes me laugh . I had it done in less then 5 mintues and I'm about to order another one .

review: Very good well worth the price, I actually plan to buy mre.

review: I loved my Chromecast and used it a lot but one day it started crashing and it won't boot anymore so now it's useless. But the price is great. If you don't have one buy it.
author: Liam Fruzyna "Liam"

review: it is great for casting chrome on TV
author: Rizwan Badarpura

review: It casts web pages or youtube the best. Throwing your own home movies to the screen will require the purchase of an app, unless you can get your browser to play them.I find that on my 55" Samsung Smart TV, the display looses a TINY bit on each edge, which can make viewing certain pages difficult.One thing I would like to see is the option to see your mouse on the display TV... as it is you cannot use it effectively in a presentation because you can't see your mouse!
author: Amazon Customer
